title: Wondering what ‘After the Hunt’ is really about? Me too.

title: BU student’s fan-made ‘Survivor’ series is a time capsule of the Palisades before devastating fire
author: Sana Muneer
bullets: Local News What started in his childhood as a “fun little project” evolved into a longstanding series that has become a symbol of hope for the Palisades’ future.
Ava Rubin/The Daily Free Press ShareSend this article to your social connections.
Just three days after he evacuated his Los Angeles home in January because of deadly wildfires, Emmett Whitaker returned to the Pacific Palisades through footage of his fan-made “Survivor” series.

title: Staffer at Mass. school dies after assault by student, DA says
author: Sana Muneer
bullets: Local News Amy Morrell, 53, was kicked in the chest while attempting to restrain a girl trying to leave a dorm building without permission, prosecutors said.
A staff member at a school in Swansea died after being assaulted by a 14-year-old student on Wednesday, officials announced Thursday.

Amy Morrell, 53, a staffer at Meadowridge Academy, was attempting to restrain a girl who was trying to leave a dorm building without permission when the girl kicked her in the chest, Bristol County District Attorney Thomas M.

title: GOP Super PAC posts doctored image of Healey, ties racist caricature to migrant policies
author: Darin Zullo
bullets: Politics The no-limit super PAC was created in May to support former MBTA head Brian Shortsleeve’s campaign and oppose Healey.
A super PAC supporting one of Gov.
Maura Healey's challengers posted a caricature of her to criticize her migrant policies.
